subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: In Utah, Freddy Adu has been reunited with John Ellinger, who was his coach with the United States under-17 national team, a run that culminated at the 2003 world championship.
snippet: In Utah, Freddy Adu has been reunited with John Ellinger, who was his coach with the United States under-17 national team, a run that culminated at the 2003 world championship.
